text: Ljupčo Jordanovski (, ; 13 February 1953 – 7 October 2010) was a Macedonian seismologist and politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Union of Macedonia party. He took office as Speaker of the Assembly on 18 November 2003. When President Boris Trajkovski was killed in a plane crash on 26 February 2004, Jordanovski was sworn in as Acting President. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Legislative speakers Category:Ambassadors Category:Presidents of North Macedonia Category:European diplomats
title: Ljupčo Jordanovski
